qas.question: What group did the Nobility of Ruthenia gravitate its loyalty towards?

What eventually became a part of the grand duchy of lithuania?
What was common for families of ruthenian and lithuanian?

context: In Ruthenia the nobility gradually gravitated its loyalty towards the <a1_0>multicultural and multilingual<a1_0/> <a0_0>Grand Duchy of Lithuania<a0_0/> after the <a2_0>principalities of Halych and Volhynia<a2_0/> became a part of it.
